short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re-discover your bookmarks with tag-cloud made from your bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookloud is a cool bookmark manager that let's you re-discover your bookmarks using tag-cloud made from your own bookmarks' titles.
Bookloud automatically groups common bookmarks under tags so you can easily find bookmarks in any topic!

Main Features:
    Automatically extarct common tags based on bookmarks titles.
    You can filter tags based on frequency.
    Search tags.
    Search through your bookmarks.
    Get approximate read time for each bookmark.
    Visit or delete a bookmark.
